Method.name: get
Method.Implementation: s storage = ..storage(), key = $g(key) Q:key="" $g(@storage, default) Q $g(@storage@(key), default)

Method.name: set
Method.Description: save settings - return settings value after save

Method.name: workdir
Method.Description: set or get working directory by default - current namespace database directory

Method.name: handlers
Method.Description: get or set handlers for event <var>handlers</var> - comma-separated value, for example: ("aftercompile") = "sc.handler,test.sctestrunner"
Method.Implementation:
Q:'$d(ext) ""
s storage = ..storage(), key = "ext"
s:$d( handlers ) @storage@( key, ext ) = handlers ;set mode
s handlers = $g( @storage@( key, ext ) ) ;get mode
Q handlers

Method.name: printer
Method.Description: get or set classname for printer
Method.Implementation: s storage = ..storage(), key = "printer" s:$d(printer) @storage@(key) = printer Q $g(@storage@(key))

Method.name: init
Method.Implementation: d ..workdir( ..workdir() ) d ..handlers( "CLS", "sc.handler" ) d ..handlers( "MAC", "sc.handler.rtn" ) d ..handlers( "INT", "sc.handler.rtn" ) d ..handlers( "INC", "sc.handler.rtn" ) d ..handlers( "DFI", "sc.handler.dfi" ) d ..printer( "sc.printer" ) Q 1
